data.lyric:
[ti:A Holly Jolly Christmas]
[ar:Burl Ives]
[al:Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Holly Jolly Christmas (From "Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer" Soundtrack) - Burl Ives (伯尔·艾夫斯)
[00:02.21]Lyrics by：Johnny Marks
[00:04.43]Composed by：Johnny Marks
[00:06.65]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:09.02]It's the best time of the year
[00:11.23]
[00:11.89]I don't know if there'll be snow
[00:14.69]But have a cup of cheer
[00:16.18]
[00:16.70]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:19.21]And when you walk down the street
[00:21.28]
[00:22.08]Say hello to friends you know
[00:24.47]And everyone you meet
[00:26.42]
[00:27.18]Oh ho the mistletoe
[00:29.74]Hung where you can see
[00:31.65]
[00:32.27]Somebody waits for you
[00:34.90]Kiss her once for me
[00:37.23]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:39.70]And in case you didn't hear
[00:42.03]
[00:42.87]Oh by golly have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:46.34]This year
[00:47.43]
[00:57.19]Holly jolly holly jolly ho
[01:01.82]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:04.40]And in case you didn't hear
[01:06.74]
[01:07.40]Oh by golly have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:12.09]This year
data.trans:
[ti:A Holly Jolly Christmas]
[ar:Burl Ives]
[al:Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:02.21]//
[00:04.43]//
[00:06.65]度过一个神圣的圣诞节
[00:09.02]这是一年中最美好的时光
[00:11.23]
[00:11.89]我不知道会不会下雪
[00:14.69]但是请你喝一杯酒
[00:16.18]
[00:16.70]度过一个神圣的圣诞节
[00:19.21]当你走在大街上
[00:21.28]
[00:22.08]向你认识的朋友问好
[00:24.47]你遇到的每个人
[00:26.42]
[00:27.18]槲寄生花环
[00:29.74]挂在你能看见的地方
[00:31.65]
[00:32.27]有人在等你
[00:34.90]替我吻她一次
[00:37.23]度过一个神圣的圣诞节
[00:39.70]以防你没有听到
[00:42.03]
[00:42.87]我的天哪祝你圣诞快乐
[00:46.34]今年
[00:47.43]
[00:57.19]冬青树
[01:01.82]度过一个神圣的圣诞节
[01:04.40]以防你没有听到
[01:06.74]
[01:07.40]我的天哪祝你圣诞快乐
[01:12.09]今年
